title-group.article-title: Cluster Algorithms for Spatial Point Processes with Symmetric and Shift Invariant Interactions

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: In this article, Swendsen-Wang-Wolff algorithms are extended to simulate spatial point processes with symmetric and stationary interactions. Convergence of these algorithms is considered. Some further generalizations of the algorithms are discussed. The ideas presented in this article can also be useful in handling some large and complicated systems.
